message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product for $11,500.  I believe it will be highly beneficial to you and I'm happy to answer any questions you may have.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product and would like to propose a counteroffer of $11,000.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $11,000 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $11,250?
Thank you for your response, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to counteroffer at $11,125.
